posts.post_content:
Available for possible trade.  Not many of these around!  One of the keys to the set with Ruth.  Very clear image, back is very clean too.  If not for the pin holes, would grade much higher obviously.
Overall, great eye appeal.

Would be interested in other Cobb's, Gehrig's, Ruth's or T206 Hofer's, Rare backs etc...

Thanks!
Darrin
